{"rule":"MORFOLOGIK_RULE_EN_US","sentence":"^\\Q(section-krylov-gmres)=\nGMRES\\E$"}
{"rule":"UPPERCASE_SENTENCE_START","sentence":"^\\Qwhere \\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-|Dummy-|Maniquí-|Maniquíes-)[0-9]+\\Q is the Krylov matrix generated using \\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-|Dummy-|Maniquí-|Maniquíes-)[0-9]+\\Q and the seed vector \\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-|Dummy-|Maniquí-|Maniquíes-)[0-9]+\\Q.\\E$"}

{"rule":"MORFOLOGIK_RULE_EN_US","sentence":"^\\QGMRES^gmres uses the Arnoldi iteration to minimize the residual \\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-|Dummy-|Maniquí-|Maniquíes-)[0-9]+\\Q over successive Krylov subspaces.\\E$"}
